name: onlinemeded/laravel-feature

scripts.check-style: phpcs -p --standard=PSR2 --runtime-set ignore_errors_on_exit 1 --runtime-set ignore_warnings_on_exit 1 src/Config src/Console src/Domain src/Facade src/Facade src/Featurable src/Model src/Provider src/Service
